channel.title: Roleplaying (new posts)
channel.description: Posts in the forum category "Roleplaying" - Want to add stories to your BvS character?

item.title: new hero coming to town: new hero coming to town
item.content:encoded: One day you were walking around your village and you saw some one in need of help so you head over to him to see what was up. He say he had put up some flyers to join his gulid but he has not hade any luck with any one joining. You ask him what it is about and he reply's: we look around the world for people who need help and we well help them to the best of our abilty you don't have to do jobs you don't wont to but to the pluse side every time you come back with a job done and with the person's name and what you did in one of thes note books (he shows you one) you get a free muffen of your chose" you look at him and think for awhile …… then you say that you will join his gulid and that you might be able to get some of your friends to join to. Then you run off looking for your friends.

item.content:encoded: name says it all

item.title: SNAKEMAN's Cantina: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana blinked when Novaix's gaze turned away and he broke eye contact

"huh!?"

She yawns and actually sees Novaix looking out the window

"Oh you musta been the person that way having all the fun"

She said to one one in particular and proceeded to ask the barperson for a vodka

"actually make it a double please"

item.title: SNAKEMAN's Cantina: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Novaix's eyes quickly reverted to normal, and his gaze turned to the window so fast, you'd barely think he was looking at you in the first place…

item.title: SNAKEMAN's Cantina: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
The Barperson give Cana her Hatake Howler and she raises a hand to grab it, not bothering to raise her head
she drags the drink over and pushers her self up eventually managing to drink the howler ……….

"AAAWWOOOOO…….WOAH That woke me up!!"

She looked at the now empty glass and suddenly snapped her head round finally noticing the familar stench of blood spying the bodies she questioned

"hnnn Did I do that?……I dont remember and I usually do concidering I like fighting..Last i remember was fighting Zombjas ….nope this was not my fault this time pity I missed all the fun ..huh?"

She turned aound feeling someone stare at her and met Novaix's gase …….

item.title: SNAKEMAN's Cantina: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: Novaix tilts his head towards the newcomer, and his eyes glitter an electric blue…

item.title: SNAKEMAN's Cantina: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
Cana yawns as she approaches

Man its been ages since Ive been here I need a howler after dealing with those zombjas

She doesn't even notice the burst of lighting and the flowing chakra, she opens the door and procees to walk on autopliot over all of the bodies, not even registering the thick smell of blood,to the bar. Proceeds to pick up a reletively undamaged stool and plonks down on it

"OI bar keep 1 Hatake Howler ove her plz nad make it snappy"

With that statement her head hits the bar and she lets out an almighty sigh

item.title: SNAKEMAN's Cantina: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded:
The air in the bar seems unusually thick compared to normal.
A burst of blinding white light shakes the building, and Novaix lies crouched in the middle of the bar.
He looks side to side, then leans in a corner, eyeing the room.

item.title: SNAKEMAN's Cantina: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: A Jonin with yellow hair jumps from tree to tree trying to find SNAKEMAN.

item.title: Chasing: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
erm.The two men came out of the hot springs,walking angrily out as the place burned behind them.

"Now"-said the young ninja "What was your plan again?"

"Burn,kill innocents.Wait for fun to arrive in the form of ninjas thinking they can take us out."
"So did we really have to kill those women and childrent?"
"Sentimental?-why do you ask?"
"I had no problem killing.I see it fruitless now though"
"What happened to those other ninjas though?"
"Power levels were under 10000"
"and they challenged US?"

item.title: Sikcools path: Sikcools path
item.content:encoded:
Sikcool is a stupid guy wich isnt so powerful.
He only has one kaiju drop.
He just achived sannin in SEASON 3 dammit.
His way was the redeye. With training from anomynus and many petals from shorty i made 7 elexirs.
With more help from the party expert j-diddy i managed to bllow up my ryo on parties… The rest i did with anomynouses secret training.
Sannin they call me now. Im a legend XD (not really, i suck)

item.title: Chasing: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded: Nah don't know what to do next.

item.title: Chasing: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded: ok ok then you can continue.Oh,and I'm partially sorry for the 110 days I didn't post anything.It isn't my fault though.

item.title: SNAKEMAN's Cantina: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: A wandering Chunin, seemingly lost, wandered right into the proximity of the cantina. Well, into the wall, more likely. Peeling himself from the brick, he wandered into the actual entrance with a cheesy monster mask on his face. "When did this bar get here?", he wondered aloud as he sat at the bar itself, watching the commotion unfold before him.

item.title: SNAKEMAN's Cantina: Re: SNAKEMAN's Cantina
item.content:encoded: A light haired jonin entered the town, his black cloak mixing himself in with the darkness fluttered in the breeze. Eyes sharp from his life of battling to survive caught sight of a newspaper article floating in the wind near him. Reaching out, he flicked a chakra string towards it and pulled it to him. SNAKEMAN was all he needed to read before deciding to go the cantina. Reaching behind him, he placed the newspaper article in a pocket next to a scroll that held all of his puppets. "Should probably get a move on if I want to get anything to drink." Pulling his hood over his head, he started towards the direction of the cantina.

item.title: Chasing: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
Within about 10 seconds the 30 ninja were captured and druged. "Do you think these losers will rall be enough" asked the rider. "Of course not, thats why i made these," said Shady Neo and then he pulled out a box of pills "these will power you up to 10 times the chakra."

Wait a second, why dont we just use them? asked the rider,clearly confused. "Because they kill you and on another note…."

item.title: Chasing: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
"Yeah,I get them"
"All of those guys hardly match our chara"
"Too bad they're not going to comply with them"
"Huh?"
"Figure it out,Sempai"
"I have already.Sharp as always"
"Did you expect anything else"
"No.You really have given me some fun with these guys,finally!"
"Didn't take all that much did it,Sempai?"
The man was using his WhiteEye now
"We're getting near the hot springs now"-he said smirking strangely
The other man punched him into a tree quickly,slightly infuriated
"Pervert"
"Look who's talking,Jealous.Getting angry over not being able to use my WhiteEye to see through walls and such"
"Look who's talking,Jealous.Getting angry over not being able to use my WhiteEye to see through clothes and such is more like it!"
"See!That's the jealousy talking right there!"

item.title: Chasing: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
"Aww dam, they left," said Shady Neo. "So where we gonna get a large supply of chakra now?" asked the rider, "we need it or a lot more people are gonna die." Calm as always Shady Neo replied "don't worry they arent the only options."

As if on cue they heard the kind of footsteps that only ninja can hear. The footsteps of other ninja.

"Something you want to tell me?" asked the rider. Shady Neo activated his White Eye and counted the ninja before saying "here come the last of our friends at the toxic village 30 in total, that should be enough."

item.title: Chasing: Re: Chasing
item.content:encoded:
the first man was clearly annoyed now
"DAMN!This is no fun."
"I agree,if only they'd stop running and trying to lure us into their plan!"
"Let's go.We have much better things to do instead of following these guys around all day"

The two men set off in another direction from where they came.1

Footnotes
1. all fer now until we get sum proper fight scenes
